summary.Title: Restaurant Manager, Odense, Denmark

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do You Dream of Running Your Own Restaurant?

Do you want to manage your own business and build something from the ground up?
Are you eager to learn how to run a successful restaurant—from daily operations to strategy and growth?
Then we have a unique opportunity for you!

Submarine is a well-established sandwich restaurant in Odense, and we are looking for an ambitious individual who wants to develop skills in restaurant management and operations.

This is not just a job—it’s an opportunity to learn every aspect of running a restaurant, with a long-term goal of becoming a partner or opening your own location in Denmark.

What We Offer
• Experience in business operations and management – Learn everything from customer service to financial planning and business development.
• Hands-on learning – You will play a key role in daily operations and gradually take on more responsibility.
• Mentorship – Ongoing support and guidance to help you grow into a leadership role.
• Opportunity for partnership – In the long run, you could become a co-owner or open your own Submarine restaurant in Denmark.
• A strong network – We will help you build connections in the industry and understand what it takes to succeed.

Who You Are:
• You have a strong interest in business operations and management.
• You thrive in a fast-paced environment with direct customer interaction.
• You have an entrepreneurial mindset and want to learn how to build a successful business.
• You are ready to take on responsibility and work hard to develop your skills.
• Experience in the restaurant or service industry is a plus but not required—the most important thing is your willingness to learn.

Location: Submarine, Kongensgade 45, 5000 Odense C, Denmark

More information:

Lisann Hougaard, lh@subsonline.dk, phone: +45 20837799

How to apply

Send us a short application explaining your motivation and ambitions.

You are welcome to include a short video introducing yourself and sharing why this opportunity excites you.
